meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Coronavirus update, brighton safety, store safety, is brighton open,

meta.name: description
meta.content: Brighton is known for its exquisitely crafted women's handbags, jewelry, and charms for bracelets, along with many other stylish accessories.

div.script: MemberMessage();

li.a:
What's your Why?
Take The Quiz

a.span:
Journey to India with
Maryam Nassirbegli

Journey to India with
Catherine Hong

img.title: Spring Charms
img.span:
Create your own spring look
with these spring charms.

img.title: Handbags
img.span:
Re-connect with nature
with handcrafted straw handbags.

img.alt: Model With Balloons and Brighton Products
img.title: The Gift Shop
Spring Jewelry
img.span:
Spring-inspired jewelry has us
dreaming of cherry blossoms.

img.alt: Collection of different chains and ropes designed accessories
img.title: Accessories
img.span:
It's all accessories
on deck—creating
a complete coastal look!

img.title: Footwear
img.span:
So long socks, hello toes—
we have 8 new flip flops!
SHOP FLIP FLOPS

img.title: Hand in Hand: Designer & Artisan
img.span:
Learn more about their hand-in-hand
collaboration and see the extraordinary
results throughout this lookbook.

img.title: Get The Looks
img.span:
Shop these timeless head-to-toe
looks all in one place.
Let the accessorizing begin!

Create your customized
locket online and we will place
the picture inside for you!

li.p:
Personalize a locket online with a photo and
we will cut and place the picture inside for you!

With the switch of a colorful cord,
you'll have a different bracelet every time!

Colorful leather inserts change the
look of these cuff bracelets and necklaces

Design a unique charm bracelet
with beads & charms

With the snap of a flap you can change your
handbag to coordinate any look.

Our skilled artisans will craft a
memory to be treasured forever.

Your monogram makes these totes
& pouches extra personal

Decorate your handbag & keys
with fun fobs & scarves!

div.script: $j('html').addClass('mm-page');

img.p: Get a first look at new arrivals, promotions and in-store events.

You are signing up to receive Brighton emails. You can withdraw your consent at any time. Read our Privacy Policy or Contact Us for more details.
(We promise not to share your information with anyone else)

a.b: Our Stores are Temporarily Closed, But We’re Still Here For You Online.

div.script: QuickCart_checkQuckCart();
_etmc.push(["setOrgId", "7277397"]);

br.p: With the well-being of our amazing customers and partners as our top concern, our stores will remain closed until we feel it is safe to reopen. In the meantime, we will keep you updated, and we want to do our very best to serve you in any way we can.

You may still shop with us online . We created a virtual space on our website, BrightonYourDay, for you to share how you’re staying positive so we can inspire one another! And, if you’re not already following us, please do visit us on Facebook and Instagram, as we’re continuing to post messages of hope and happiness there.
We welcome and very much appreciate your continued support, and we’re all anxiously awaiting the day we can open our stores again. We miss you!

center.div: © document.write(new Date().getFullYear()) Brighton Collectibles, LLC. All rights reserved.
